string.text: {=ROTStrLiegeTittleBraavos}Sealord of Braavos
{=ROTStrLiegeTittleFBraavos}Sealord of Braavos
{=ROTStrLiegeTitleIronborn}King of Salt and Rock
{=ROTStrLiegeTitleFIronborn}Queen of Salt and Rock
{=ROTStrLiegeTitleDorne}Prince of Dorne
{=ROTStrLiegeTitleFDorne}Princess of Dorne
{=ROTStrLiegeTitleNorth}King in the North
{=ROTStrLiegeTitleFNorth}Queen in the North
{=ROTStrLiegeTitleWesterlands}Warden of the West
{=ROTStrLiegeTitleFWesterlands}Warden of the West
{=ROTStrLiegeTitleDothraki}Khal of the Dothraki Horde
{=ROTStrLiegeTitleFDothraki}Khalesi of the Dothraki Horde
{=ROTCommentNoble001}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has served Braavos for generations.
{=ROTCommentNoble002}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has stood since the founding of the great city of Braavos.

{=ROTCommentNoble003}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Though one should not be too proud of one's lineage, I am glad to say that we have always taken seriously our duty to protect the common folk of Braavos.
{=ROTCommentNoble004}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Braavos.

{=ROTCommentNoble005}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of Braavos. The barbarians we have slain, and the glory we have won, is second to none.
{=ROTCommentNoble006}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, we hail from the Iron Islands since ancient times.
{=ROTCommentNoble007}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, a name you will have heard many times in the sagas of the Ironborn.
{=ROTCommentNoble008}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We are of salt and rock, none like you on the mainland.
{=ROTCommentNoble009}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, one of the ancient lineages of the North.
{=ROTCommentNoble010}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. The fame of our family is second to none in the songs of the North.
{=ROTCommentNoble011}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. No harder family in all of the North.

{=ROTCommentNoble012}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. The blood of the First Men run through our veins, of course thats what they say in the Iron Islands and north of the Wall also.
{=ROTCommentNoble013}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has served the Warden of the West for generations.
{=ROTCommentNoble014}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We hold our lands in fief to {LIEGE_TITLE}, and we honor our oaths of fealty.
{=ROTCommentNoble015}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Westerlands.
{=ROTCommentNoble016}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We serve the lord of Casterly Rock. I pass by the ruins of Castamere often as a reminder of my place.
{=ROTCommentNoble017}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, a noble house of Dorne.
{=ROTCommentNoble018}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, the most ancient and noble of the Dornish.
{=ROTCommentNoble019}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We follow the great Khal for glory and plunder.
{=ROTCommentNoble020}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We will fight with the Khal until we reach the Nightlands.
